column4:
Calculation methodology - 
Simple interest method during moratorium period & compounding interest method thereafter except TATA Capital which only uses simple interest method
column5:
Types -
Floating - Linked to floating base rate + Risk premium (depending on profile)
Fixed - Linked to fixed base rate + Risk premium (depending on profile)
MCLR Linked Rate - Marginal Cost of Funds Based Lending Rate

Floating rate base types - 
RBLR/RLLR - Repo rate Based Lending Rate 
CRP - Credit Risk Premium
BSD  - Base Rate (BR) Spread Discount
EBLR - External Benchmark Lending Rate
